text_block_list.text:
After going out with Sakura Bakushin O, 
we were supposed to have dinner and 
go home, but…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! I… have a restaurant I'd like
to take you to!

I was taken along by her, accompanying 
her to…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I can't waait～! The "Deluxe" course at 
this ryokan is famous for its 
all-you-can-eat crab…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oyaoya! Trainer, you look so 
excited that you're freaking out!?
choice_data_list:
No, I was wondering if it's really alright to use your 
card…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fu-fu-fu… No need to worry! 
Because Trainer is my "special person"!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In fact, the other day I delivered 
an elderly woman to the hospital, who 
was huddled in pain…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
That person turned out to be the 
proprietress of this place!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And so, as a thank you, "Please, come
with your special someone," was the
invitation I received!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So go ahead and relax, please stuff 
yourself full!

I was touched by Sakura Bakushin O's 
words, and I did, indeed, relax as I 
waited for the food to be served――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Oohhhhh～～! This is deliciooous～～! 
This one, that one, they all taste 
so expensive!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, what do you think, what do you 
think? Is it delicious? 
Are you deeply moved!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aaall right! Now, onto the main 
dish! …Is what I'd love to do, but――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This crab! The way this crab is cooked
is the only thing that, no matter how I
try… I'm, not very good at… well……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You're not coming out at all! 
You're hiding in your spike-y shell! 
That's unsportsmanlike!

…Definitely, the delicate task of
extracting the crab from its shell
looks difficult for someone as hasty and
impatient as her.
choice_data_list: Crab is a battle of patience!
You can crack them with utensils.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Patience…! I see, now that you say that! 
Because everything can be done with 
patience, can't it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Aaaaall ri～ght! Patience is an honor
roll student's specialty! Leave it all
to me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hummmmuuuuuu～～!! 
Bakushin's, patieeeencee～～!!
(Crack! Crack, craaack!!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Wheee―w… 
Some way or another, I managed to smash 
all the shells.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ehhen! That's right, this is the
patience of an honor roll student!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Come, now! Trainer, dig in! And while
you're eating, I'll serve you another
round!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Nonono! I have decided! That you 
shall enjoy this!

Sakura Bakushin O's offer moved 
me once again… and I decided to 
put my faith in her.

…The cracked crab shells were 
painful to the tongue, but the two of 
us enjoyed the meal together――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Haaaa～～… 
That food was absolutely delicious!
choice_data_list: Thank you for letting me enjoy it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
My pleasure! Thanks to the advice of 
my Trainer, my patience won out over 
the crabs!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: My Trainer always inspires me this way!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
If Trainer had been a classmate 
of mine, I would have even recruited 
Trainer to be my vice president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ha… So this is how Trainer felt when 
you scouted me!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe―! Is that so, is that so～～! 
You're making me blush～.

We had both full stomachs and full 
hearts over our banquet cuisine.

I handed her a spoon made 
especially for cracking crabs――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohhhh～～!? That stubborn crab broke 
apart so easily!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Then, leave the peeling to me! 
Please do enjoy the fruits of my labor, 
Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Nonono! I have decided! That you 
shall enjoy this!

Sakura Bakushin O's offer moved 
me once again… and I decided to 
put my faith in her.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
(Chew, chew!) Ah, here comes the
next crab! Mr. Crab, so hefty!
Bakushinbakushin!

…Her crab-handling was too fast, and I 
had to eat an absurd amont of food, 
but we enjoyed our dinner――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Haaaa～～… 
That food was absolutely delicious!
choice_data_list: Thank you for letting me enjoy it.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
No, no! I'm the one who 
wants to thank you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Thanks to Trainer, I have now gained 
another Bakushin speciality of mine!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Please continue to teach me so much! 
And――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I hope you'll continue to, as an
important person in my life, polish my
Bakushin together with me!

We had both full stomachs and full 
hearts over our banquet cuisine.
